TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnitConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 从 对象转换为其他数据类型的对象，和从其他类型转换为 对象。

span.span: Converts from a object to an object of another data type and from another type to a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类将转换 为另一种数据类型的对象。Use the class to convert a to an object of another data type. 还可以使用 类将另一种数据类型的对象转换为 。You can also use the class to convert an object of another data type to a . > [!NOTE] > 此转换器只能将字符串转换为 字符串，并将转换为 字符串。This converter can convert only a string to and a to a string. > [!CAUTION] > 永远不应直接访问类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 改为使用调用适当的转换器 。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls and CSS Styles
